name: musiccollector
description: A simple website/blog written with Wagtail CMS. This project is based on info gleamed from the official [Wagtail Bakery Demo](https://github.com/wagtail/bakerydemo), and watching the [Learn Wagtail](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLMQHMcNi6ocsS8Bfnuy_IDgJ4bHRRrvub) videos on Youtube.
